I never seen before the community like CS:GO community in another games. In this game community is better than all of the other games. Sometimes you feel like this game is suck but sometimes you feel the game. I have 6k hours in this game (mb more) and I am 2600 elo in faceit (I was 3k) . And I swear even you are playing for develop yourself and reach some where you can play more competitive(like fpl or fpl c or something.) you will have fun. I am trying to say that this game has a history. more than another games. And if you are new player its gonna be hard because everyone knows now how to play somehow or how to win rounds. everyone in this game have a tricks... So if you are new player you should be patient about playing better. for my opinion if you have no idea about fps games don't start. if you are having fun ofc you can start :d but don't expect more than having fun. which, having fun is enough to play games :) for me in this game i am having fun even i loose even i win.
